bibliographic-data.invention-title: GAME MACHINE AND COMPUTER GAME PROGRAM

abstract.p: There is provided a game machine configured such that the activity is enhanced in a game where points are gained depending on the state of the plural component objects being piled up in a game image. The shot line to be moved out of the lines of ball masses BM, BM100 constituted by plural balls B, B100, by the moving line determination operation by a player, and the moving distance for which the moving line ML is moved is determined by the moving distance determination operation by the player. The plural balls B, B100 on the determined moving line are moved in the line direction depending on the determined moving distance. In the case that, after the moving line moving, the plural balls B, B100 in the ball masses BM establish a predetermined state, the plural balls B, B100 are deleted, and the balls B, B100 arranged on the column of the deleted balls B, B100 are moved in the column direction.

PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a game machine wherein action characteristics are enhanced in a game of obtaining scores in accordance with the state of a plurality of components piled up on a game screen. SOLUTION: The game machine includes: a shift row determining section 14b for determining a shoot row, which is to be shifted, among a plurality of rows of a ball pile BM consisting of a plurality of balls B by a player's shift row deciding operation
a shift amount deciding section 14c for deciding a shift amount of shifting a shift row by a player's shift amount deciding operation

a shifting section 14d for shifting a plurality of balls B on the decided shift row in the row direction Id in accordance with the decided shift amount, as to the ball pile BM. When a plurality of balls B in the ball pile BM after the shifting of the shift row exhibit a predetermined state, the plurality of balls B are extinguished, and the balls B arranged on the columns of the extinguished balls B are shifted in the column direction rd.

PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a game machine configured so that a player's operation also affects components of an opponent in a game of obtaining scores in accordance with the state of a plurality of components ball piled up. SOLUTION: The game machine GM includes: an assembly display section 10a which displays two ball piles BM1 and BM2 of balls disposed with a plurality of types of balls B into matrix shapes, adjoined to each other in a row direction on a game screen GI
an assembly setting section 10b which sets the ball pile BM1 of balls of the player P and the ball pile BM2 of balls of the opponent CP

a moving processing section 10c which moves a moving row ML of the ball pile BM1 of balls in the direction of the ball pile BM2 of balls and also moves an opponent's moving row CML of the ball pile BM2 of the balls according to the operation of the player P

and a moving result processing section 10d which calculates the score of the player P, after moving the moving row ML, based on the ball pile BM1 of balls and calculates the score of the opponent CP based on the state of the ball pile BM2 of the balls.

There is provided a game machine which improves actional performance in a game where a score is obtained in accordance with a sate of plural components being built up in a game image. A game machine has a move line determining portion 14b, a move amount determining portion 14c, and a move executing portion 14d. The move line determining portion 14b determines a shoot line to be moved, from plural lines in a ball mount BM being composed of plural balls B in reply to a move line determining operation by a player. The move amount determining portion 14c determines in reply to a move amount determining operation by the player, a move amount by which the move line is moved. The move executing portion 14d makes the plural balls B on the determined move line move in a line direction ld in accordance with the determined move amount for the ball mount BM.

In a case where plural balls B in the ball mount BM, after the move line has moved, form a predetermined state, the plural balls B are deleted, and the ball B arranged on a raw of each of the deleted balls B is made to move in a raw direction rd.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: MACHINE DE JEU ET PROGRAMME DE JEU

nplcit.text: 'Puyopuyo SUN' GEKKAN AMUSEMENT SANGYO HEISEI 9 NEN 1 GATSUGO vol. 26, 26 December 1996, page 230

abstract.p: Provided is a game machine wherein action characteristics are enhanced in a game of obtaining scores in accordance with the state of a plurality of components piled up on a game screen. A player's shift row deciding operation decides a shoot row, which is to be shifted, among a plurality of rows of a ball pile (BM, BM 100) consisting of a plurality of balls (B, B 100), and a player's shift amount deciding operation decides a shift amount of shifting a shift row (ML). As to the ball pile (BM, BM 100), a plurality of balls (B, B 100) on the decided shift row are shifted in the row direction in accordance with the decided shift amount. When a plurality of balls (B, B 100) in the ball pile (BM) after the shifting of the shift row exhibit a predetermined state, the plurality of balls (B, B 100) are extinguished, and the balls (B, B 100) arranged on the columns of the extinguished balls (B, B 100) are shifted in the column direction.

L'invention porte sur une machine de jeu dans laquelle des caractéristiques d'action sont améliorées dans un jeu d'obtention de scores en fonction de l'état d'une pluralité de composants empilés sur un écran de jeu. Une opération de décision de rangée de décalage de joueur décide d'une rangée de tir, qui doit être décalée, parmi une pluralité de rangées d'une pile de balles (BM, BM100) constituées d'une pluralité de balles (B, B100), et une opération de décision d'ampleur de décalage de joueur décide d'une ampleur de décalage du décalage d'une rangée de décalage (ML). En ce qui concerne la pile de balles (BM, BM100), une pluralité de balles (B, B100) de la rangée de décalage choisi sont décalées dans la direction de rangée en fonction de l'ampleur de décalage choisi.

Lorsqu'une pluralité de balles (B, B100) dans la pile de balles (BM) après le décalage de la rangée de décalage présente un état prédéterminé, la pluralité de balles (B, B100) sont éteintes et les balles (B, B100) disposées dans les colonnes des balles éteintes (B, B100) sont décalées dans la direction de la colonne.
